basics.name: Shane Trimbur
basics.label: Solutions Architect -- Client Solutions -- Cybersecurity Engineering
basics.summary: Veteran cybersecurity strategist with extensive DoD enterprise expertise spanning two decades. Proven ability to build and guide diverse teams while establishing forward-looking capabilities that exceed targets. Employs insider knowledge as a Marine technical leader versed in delivering innovative solutions that meet complex government needs. Leverages deep defense sector expertise to transform mission requirements into enterprise-ready architectures.

work.name: 3rd Marine Aircraft Wing
work.position: Data Systems Engineering Officer -- Information Systems Security Engineer
work.summary: Leading enterprise cloud adoption and data fusion initiatives for MARFORPAC and 3rd MAW.
highlights: Spearheaded enterprise cloud adoption initiative impacting MARFORPAC and 3rd MAW
Pioneered innovative Azure-based data fusion system
responsibilities: Implementing experimental multi-cloud architecture through the Joint Warfighting Cloud Capability program
Integrating Naval Research Labs with partner agencies for real-time environmental intelligence sharing
achievements: Designed and coordinated authority to operate for hybrid cloud environmental intelligence integrations for enhanced battlefield visualization

work.name: Marine Wing Communications Squadron 38
work.position: Data Systems Engineering Officer -- Information Systems Security Engineer
work.summary: Led award-winning JADC2 transformation initiative and tactical infrastructure modernization.
highlights: Led systems engineering activities toward award-winning JADC2 transformation initiative
Modernized tactical infrastructure supporting 20,000+ joint force personnel
Supervised integration of advanced network systems during Project Convergence
responsibilities: Developed and maintained backend services using Python and Django.
Worked closely with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
Participated in daily stand-ups and bi-weekly sprint planning meetings to ensure alignment with project goals.
achievements: Successfully implemented a feature that enhanced user authentication, improving security measures.

work.name: Web Agency
work.summary: Assisted in developing client websites and applications. Gained hands-on experience with front-end and back-end technologies.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
highlights: Built with React and Tailwind CSS
Includes a blog and contact form

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A web application that provides weather information for any location.
highlights: Built with JavaScript and OpenWeatherMap API

projects.name: Task Manager
projects.description: A simple task management app to keep track of daily tasks.

projects.name: E-commerce Site
projects.description: An online store built with Next.js and Stripe for payment processing.
highlights: Product management and shopping cart functionality
